name: Side Quest Generating System
description:
This is a short game made for as a bachelor thesis project on Charles University in Prague, under the game development group (gamedev.cuni.cz). The text of the thesis is included as a downloadable content.

In the game, side quests are generated using hand-made building blocks. There are 25 different blocks in the game from which the quests are generated, therefore it is possible (and very probable) you'll encounter a block you know after some time.

The goal of the project was to prove that it's possible to create a system that would generate a nontrivial number of quests from limited number of building blocks.
